ABOUT ME

Electrical Designer & Researcher Specializing in Sensor Technologies

I am an aspiring electrical engineer with a hybrid background in pure science and applied technology. My academic and professional trajectory has equipped me with the ability to comprehend complex physical phenomenon and design systems that quantify them with enhanced precision. Accordingly I now specialize in augumenting sensors with application specific electronic systems and have worked alongside senior researchers, integrating a variety of novel sensor technologies and implementing unique measurement methodologies. I am passionate about improving system efficiency, reliability, and performance, and thrive on tackling complex problems that require both creativity and technical expertise.
